name: Onigiri
imgAlt: Japanese rice balls wrapped in nori seaweed
ingredients: Filling options: pickled plum, salmon, tuna mayo
instructions: Cook rice according to package instructions and let cool slightly.
Mix salt into the rice while still warm.
Wet hands with water and place a handful of rice in palm.
Make an indentation and add your chosen filling.
Cover filling with more rice and shape into a triangle.
Wrap with nori strip and serve.
